mapper.select: SELECT t.ID, t.PROCINSTID, t.TASKID, t.TASKNAME, t.TASKDEFKEY, t.STARTTIME, t.ENDTIME, (SELECT CONCAT(emp.EMPNAME,'(',emp.BADGE,') ')FROM JBOS_EMP emp WHERE emp.BADGE=t.ASSIGNEE limit 1) EMPNAME, t.TASKSTATE FROM JBOS_PROCESS_TASK t WHERE t.PROCINSTID=#{procInstId} AND t.TASKSTATE IN ('20','90','99') ORDER BY t.STARTTIME

SELECT t.ID, t.PROCINSTID, t.TASKID, t.TASKNAME title, t.TASKDEFKEY, t.STARTTIME, t.ENDTIME, (SELECT CONCAT(emp.EMPNAME,'(',emp.BADGE,') ',IFNULL(t.ENDTIME,''))FROM JBOS_EMP emp WHERE emp.BADGE=t.ASSIGNEE limit 1) description, t.TASKSTATE, CASE WHEN t.TASKSTATE='90' || t.TASKSTATE='99' THEN 'success' ELSE 'process' END status FROM JBOS_PROCESS_TASK t WHERE t.PROCINSTID=#{procInstId} AND t.TASKSTATE IN ('20','90','99') ORDER BY t.STARTTIME

SELECT t.ID, t.PROCINSTID, t.TASKID, t.TASKDEFKEY, t.TASKNAME, t.STARTTIME, t.ENDTIME, t.ASSIGNEE FROM JBOS_PROCESS_TASK t LEFT JOIN JBOS_PROCESS_INST T1 ON t.PROCINSTID=T1.PROCINSTID WHERE t.TASKDEFKEY=#{currentTaskDefKey} AND t.ASSIGNEE!=#{userId} AND t.TASKSTATE NOT IN ('90','99')

SELECT T.ID, T.BADGE, T.EMPNAME, T2.ROLECODE, T2.ROLENAME FROM JBOS_EMP T INNER JOIN JBOS_USER_ROLE T1 ON T.ID=T1.USERID LEFT JOIN JBOS_ROLE T2 ON T1.ROLEID=T2.ID WHERE T.ISVALID=1 AND T2.ROLECODE=#{nextTaskDefKey}
AND T.DEPID=#{depId}
mapper.insert: INSERT JBOS_PROCESS_TASK( ID, PROCINSTID, TASKDEFKEY, TASKNAME, ASSIGNEE, TASKSTATE, STARTTIME )VALUE( #{id}, #{procInstId}, #{taskDefKey}, #{taskName}, #{assignee}, '20', #{startTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE JBOS_PROCESS_TASK SET ENDTIME=#{endTime},TASKSTATE='10' WHERE PROCINSTID=#{procInstId} AND TASKDEFKEY=#{taskDefKey} AND ASSIGNEE!=#{assignee} AND TASKSTATE='20'
